name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export Cardmarket Want List to CSV

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export Cardmarket Want List to CSV

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool helps you exporting your Cardmarket want list to a basic CSV file. Once installed please visit your wantlist and use the context menu to download the CSV file. Then you can use these files to populate your wantlist(s) area in https://mtg-inventory-wantlist.netlify.app/
